response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $11,000 for this exceptional item. This price not only reflects the quality of the product but also provides you with a significant advantage over your competitors. I trust that you'll find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how we can proceed.", "product_price": 11000}
